title: Pluribus
overview: The most miserable person on Earth must save the world from happiness.
reason: Highly anticipated from acclaimed creator Vince Gilligan (Breaking Bad) on Apple TV, boasting an excellent 87 Metacritic score and an 8.6 IMDb rating from over 26,000 votes.

title: The Last Frontier
overview: When a prison transport plane crashes in the remote Alaskan wilderness—freeing dozens of violent inmates—the region's lone marshal must protect the town he's vowed to keep safe.

title: Alien: Earth
overview: When the mysterious deep space research vessel USCSS Maginot crash-lands on Earth, Wendy and a ragtag group of tactical soldiers make a fateful discovery that puts them face-to-face with the planet's greatest threat.
reason: Part of the iconic 'Alien' franchise, this FX/Hulu series is helmed by Noah Hawley (Fargo) and produced by Ridley Scott's company. It has an excellent 85 Metacritic score and an impressive 82,000+ IMDb votes.

title: The Terminal List: Dark Wolf
overview: Before The Terminal List, Navy SEAL Ben Edwards finds himself entangled in the black operations side of the CIA. The deeper Ben goes into the 'gray', the harder it will become to not give himself over to his darker impulses. Every man has two wolves inside him – light and dark – fighting for control. Which wolf will Ben Edwards feed?

title: Task
overview: In the working-class suburbs of Philadelphia, an FBI agent heads a task force assembled to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.
reason: A prestige HBO drama starring Mark Ruffalo and created by Brad Ingelsby (Mare of Easttown). It holds a strong 77 Metacritic score and an 8.0 IMDb rating from over 45,000 votes.

title: Wayward
overview: A small-town cop suspects that the local school for troubled teens — and its dangerously charismatic founder — may not be all it seems.

title: Black Rabbit
overview: A rising-star restaurateur is forced into New York's criminal underworld when his chaotic brother returns to town with loan sharks on his trail.
reason: This Netflix crime drama features A-list actors Jason Bateman and Jude Law, who also serve as producers. It has a solid 7.4 IMDb rating from over 35,000 votes, indicating significant audience interest.
